name: Pluck it out
description:
You have the most important date of your life coming up and your eyebrows are a mess. Pluck out the mischievous hairs that are trying to dodge the tweezers for their life.

This is a local multiplayer game where one player controls the tweezers using the controller/WASD and the other player plays as the hair trying to dodge the tweezers by moving in front of the Kinect camera.

Pre-requisites:

* Kinect V1 (Install Kinect SDK V1.8)

* Keyboard/Controller

Credits:

* Vilius Drumsta - Programming

* Hsuan Chao - Art

* Kshitij Srivastava - Programming

* Alex Hans - Programming

* Aleix Ramon - Music,  www.aleixramon.com
